# XPC_EVENT_KEY_NAME

**Global Variable**

A key for querying an XPC event dictionary to retrieve a string that identifies the event.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated(unsafe) let XPC_EVENT_KEY_NAME: UnsafePointer<CChar>
```

## Event handling

- **xpc_set_event_stream_handler(_:_:_:)**: Sets the event handler to invoke when receiving streamed events.

items.description: Sets the event handler to invoke when receiving streamed events.
